name: Kyle
text: Has it ever occur to you that you can't seem to find that specific word?

name: Kyle
text: That's why dictionary is used to store large amounts of data for easy and quick access.

name: Kyle
text: A good dictionary can help you understand your subject better,

name: Kyle
text: improve your communication and by making sure you are using words correctly.

name: Kyle
text: It's a good idea to use them whenever we want to find a certain object when needed the most!
